game.title: Love Loop
game.concept: A multiplayer emotional fidget game where players secretly choose Love, Friendship, or Sex each round. Choices influence hidden averages that evolve until equilibrium (Bingo) is reached.

easy.description: Short, playful — ends after 5 rounds minimum.

hard.description: More tension and time to build pattern awareness.

hardest.description: Maximum suspense — deep reading and patience required.

connectivity.visibility: Players can only see nearby connections within the game lobby.

flow.1: Player opens the app and enables Bluetooth.
flow.2: The app scans for other devices running Love Loop.
flow.3: When both players confirm connection, the lobby transitions into Round 1.

gameplay.round_structure: Both players choose one of three emotions each round: Love ❤️, Friendship 💛, or Sex 💜.
gameplay.round_feedback: Players only see subtle aura animations — no direct reveal of the other’s choice.

conditions.bingo: Triggered only if average(Friendship + Sex) > average(Love) after minimum rounds are completed.
conditions.replay: Occurs if Love average dominates or if minimum rounds not reached.

round_animations.love: Soft red glow expanding outward with slow heartbeat pulse.
round_animations.friendship: Warm yellow aura radiating evenly in circular waves.
round_animations.sex: Vibrant magenta pulse with spark-like flickers.
round_animations.replay: Screen ripple transition and low chime.
round_animations.bingo: Converging aura colors merging into white flash — brief vibrational feedback.

ui.theme: Minimal aura aesthetic — clean neon lines on dark matte background.

elements: Subtle animated background showing player’s aura
Progress bars for Love, Friendship, Sex averages
Option to Restart or Share Result

system_texts.replay: The balance hasn’t settled yet. Keep looping.

visual_effects.transition: Fade-through black with glowing particle trail
visual_effects.bingo_reveal: White-out flash then fade into mixed gradient of red, yellow, and purple.

logic.turn_system: Alternate between players each round. No player can see the other's choice.

per_player: Running averages for Love, Friendship, Sex

logic.round_completion: When both players have chosen, app records results and updates progress.
logic.end_condition: Check mode’s minimum round limit; if met, evaluate averages and decide Bingo or Replay.

replay_loop.mechanic: Each Replay subtly alters background hue toward red, representing emotional heat rising.
narrative_feedback: ‘You’re close, but the aura isn’t balanced yet.’
‘Love burns too bright; cool down to connect.’

animation: All three aura colors swirl toward the center.
Merged white flash with soft reverb sound.
bingo_sequence.call_to_action: Invite rematch or share your aura balance.
